downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 White Paper: Visual SourceSafe Version Control Setup
downloadDescription: This document describes how to set up the version control system for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 using Microsoft Visual SourceSafe.

downloadFile.name: Visual SourceSafe Version Control Setup Whitepaper for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/6/e/a/6eafe386-b479-4e6a-997b-f4220eaef806/Visual SourceSafe Version Control Setup Whitepaper for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.pdf

downloadFile.name: Visual SourceSafe Version Control Setup Whitepaper for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.xps
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/6/e/a/6eafe386-b479-4e6a-997b-f4220eaef806/Visual SourceSafe Version Control Setup Whitepaper for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.xps

detailsSection: This white paper contains procedures to install and configure version control for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 using Microsoft Visual SourceSafe. This paper is designed to be used in conjunction with the Team Server (ID Server) Setup white paper for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.
detailsSection_file_name: Visual SourceSafe Version Control Setup Whitepaper for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.pdf
Visual SourceSafe Version Control Setup Whitepaper for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.xps
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • To view the XPS file, you will need Windows Vista or the Microsoft XML Paper Specification Essentials Pack.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file or XPS file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
